name: Phenotype
description:
WIP. This is pretty much just a proof of concept as it stands. 

ENTER to start the game from the title screen, or ESCAPE to close it. WASD to move (jump on W), interact with SPACE, use power with SHIFT, reset the room with R.

Theres just one obstacle course for now.

**if you hit esc in game, theres technically a pause menu, it just doesn't have a sprite yet... pressing S then ENTER will take you back to the title screen, pressing S, S, then ENTER will exit the game.

Made for SGDC's 2-day game jam, Game Jam E. Everything in this game was made by me within the 48 hours of the jam in GMS2.
